description.value: At 20th level, you fully embrace your oni heritage to unlock its maximum potential. You gain the ability to change your shape between your natural form and that of any one Large humanoid creature of the giant subtype at will (as the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.61uvtd18e9s6zku3]{Giant Form I}). You must choose which creature you wish to be able to change into when you reach 20th level; once you make this decision, you cannot change it. You can switch between your forms at will, and can assume your giant form for as long as you want. In addition, you gain SR equal to 6 + your sorcerer level, and whenever you cast a spell of the charm or compulsion subschool, the spellâ€™s DC increases by +2.
